body:
Hi Greg -- thanks for the reply. Indeed setting -ps 1 fixes the issue. 
At this resolution, the solar disc is actually ~5 x 5 pixels, so it must 
have been a very near miss with the default of -ps 4.


Best,
Alstan
___
